short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shows percent of viewers who liked the video. Useful proxy for the old like:dislike ratio.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Now that the dislike count is gone and with it the like/dislike ratio, this extension calculates the percent of viewers who liked a video, giving some idea of viewer sentiment.
